nodes.bodyText: I think we use underscores normally
Use underscores for column name and defaultValueBoolean="false"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+<?xml version="1.1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
+<databaseChangeLog xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:ext="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext" xmlns:pro="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-ext.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro/liquibase-pro-4.1.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.1.xsd">
+    <changeSet author="schultek" id="20201111141743">
+        <addColumn tableName="programming_exercise_details">
+            <column name="show-test-names-to-students" type="BOOLEAN" />

nodes.bodyText: You need to include this file in liquibase/master.xml
not sure if BOOLEAN is the right type, please check the other xml files
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+<?xml version="1.1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
+<databaseChangeLog xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:ext="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext" xmlns:pro="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-ext.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/pro/liquibase-pro-4.1.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-4.1.xsd">
+    <changeSet author="schultek" id="20201111141743">
+        <addColumn tableName="programming_exercise_details">
+            <column name="show_test_names_to_students" type="BOOLEAN" defaultValueBoolean="false" />

nodes.bodyText: i changed this to 'bit' as seen in other changelogs
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,8 @@
+<?xml version="1.1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

+    <changeSet author="schultek" id="20201111141743">
+        <addColumn tableName="programming_exercise_details">
+            <column name="show_test_names_to_students" type="BOOLEAN" defaultValueBoolean="false" />
